pages.title: Speckled Wood Butterfly
pages.text: The speckled wood ($(o)Pararge aegeria$()) is a butterfly found in and on the borders of woodland areas throughout much of the Palearctic realm.$(br2)The species is subdivided into multiple subspecies, including Pararge aegeria aegeria, Pararge aegeria tircis, Pararge aegeria oblita, and Pararge aegeria insula.

pages.title: Speckled Wood Butterfly
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:dandelion$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: None Days
